verses.text: This \w is|strong="H5030"\w* \w the|strong="H2372"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* \w that|strong="H5030"\w* \w Habakkuk|strong="H2265"\w* \w the|strong="H2372"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* received \w in|strong="H5030"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* vision:

\w How|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w call|strong="H7768"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w help|strong="H3467"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w You|strong="H5704"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w You|strong="H5704"\w*, “\w Violence|strong="H2555"\w*!” \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w You|strong="H5704"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w*?

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w You|strong="H4100"\w* \w make|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5999"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w You|strong="H4100"\w* tolerate \w wrongdoing|strong="H5999"\w*? \w Destruction|strong="H7701"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*. \w Strife|strong="H7379"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* ongoing, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w conflict|strong="H7379"\w* abounds.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w is|strong="H7563"\w* paralyzed, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w goes|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w hem|strong="H3803"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w perverted|strong="H6127"\w*.

“\w Look|strong="H7200"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w observe|strong="H7200"\w*—\w be|strong="H3808"\w* utterly \w astounded|strong="H8539"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w doing|strong="H6466"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w work|strong="H6467"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* would \w never|strong="H3808"\w* believe \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* someone \w told|strong="H5608"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1980"\w* \w raising|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*—\w that|strong="H3588"\w* ruthless \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w impetuous|strong="H4116"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w which|strong="H1471"\w* \w marches|strong="H1980"\w* \w through|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w breadth|strong="H4800"\w* \w of|strong="H4908"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w seize|strong="H3423"\w* \w dwellings|strong="H4908"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* own.

\w They|strong="H1931"\w* \w are|strong="H4941"\w* dreaded \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w*; \w from|strong="H4480"\w* themselves \w they|strong="H1931"\w* derive \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* sovereignty.

\w Their|strong="H7043"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w are|strong="H5483"\w* \w swifter|strong="H7043"\w* \w than|strong="H7043"\w* \w leopards|strong="H5246"\w*, fiercer \w than|strong="H7043"\w* \w wolves|strong="H2061"\w* \w of|strong="H5483"\w* \w the|strong="H7043"\w* \w night|strong="H6153"\w*. \w Their|strong="H7043"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* charge ahead, \w and|strong="H5483"\w* \w their|strong="H7043"\w* \w cavalry|strong="H6571"\w* comes \w from|strong="H7350"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w*. They \w fly|strong="H5774"\w* \w like|strong="H5483"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* vulture, \w swooping|strong="H2363"\w* \w down|strong="H5774"\w* \w to|strong="H2363"\w* devour.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* come bent \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*; \w their|strong="H3605"\w* hordes advance \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w wind|strong="H6921"\w*; \w they|strong="H3605"\w* gather \w prisoners|strong="H7628"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w sand|strong="H2344"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1931"\w* \w scoff|strong="H7046"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* make \w rulers|strong="H7336"\w* \w an|strong="H4428"\w* object \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w scorn|strong="H7832"\w*. \w They|strong="H1931"\w* \w laugh|strong="H7832"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w fortress|strong="H4013"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* build \w up|strong="H6651"\w* siege ramps \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w seize|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w they|strong="H2098"\w* \w sweep|strong="H2498"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w* \w like|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w and|strong="H5674"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w*. \w They|strong="H2098"\w* are guilty; their own \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* their god.”

\w Are|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H7760"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H6924"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w*? \w We|strong="H4191"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w You|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w execute|strong="H4191"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*; \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Rock|strong="H6697"\w*, \w You|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w established|strong="H3245"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w correction|strong="H3198"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* pure \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w tolerate|strong="H3201"\w* \w wrongdoing|strong="H5999"\w*. \w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w tolerate|strong="H3201"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* faithless? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w silent|strong="H2790"\w* \w while|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w swallow|strong="H1104"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w themselves|strong="H7451"\w*?

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w fish|strong="H1709"\w* \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w creeping|strong="H7431"\w* \w things|strong="H7431"\w* \w that|strong="H7431"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* foe \w pulls|strong="H5927"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hook|strong="H2443"\w*; \w he|strong="H3651"\w* catches \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* dragnet, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* gathers \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w fishing|strong="H4365"\w* \w net|strong="H2764"\w*; \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w rejoices|strong="H8055"\w* \w gladly|strong="H8055"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H6999"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* dragnet \w and|strong="H2076"\w* \w burns|strong="H6999"\w* \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w fishing|strong="H4365"\w* \w net|strong="H2764"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w things|strong="H2764"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* sumptuous \w and|strong="H2076"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w food|strong="H3978"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w rich|strong="H8082"\w*.

\w Will|strong="H1471"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w*, \w empty|strong="H7324"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w net|strong="H2764"\w* \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w continue|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2550"\w*?
